channel.title: Intellectual Property on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Intellectual Property on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Neuralink’s Bid to Trademark ‘Telepathy’ and ‘Telekinesis’ Faces Legal Issues
item.description: The brain implant company cofounded by Elon Musk filed to trademark the product names Telepathy and Telekinesis. But it turns out that another person had already filed to trademark those names.

item.title: Neuralink’s Bid to Trademark ‘Telepathy’ and ‘Telekinesis’ Faces Legal Issues
item.description: The brain implant company cofounded by Elon Musk filed to trademark the product names Telepathy and Telekinesis. But it turns out that another person had already filed to trademark those names.

item.title: Anthropic Settles High-Profile AI Copyright Lawsuit Brought by Book Authors
item.description: Anthropic faced the prospect of more than $1 trillion in damages, a sum that could have threatened the company’s survival if the case went to trial.

item.title: Anthropic Settles High-Profile AI Copyright Lawsuit Brought by Book Authors
item.description: Anthropic faced the prospect of more than $1 trillion in damages, a sum that could have threatened the company’s survival if the case went to trial.

item.title: Toymaker suddenly drops lawsuit against “Sylvanian Drama” TikToker
item.description: Looks like the “Sylvanian Drama” TikTok will be revived after a long hiatus.
